subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: In the Tour de France, Blel Kadri won a rainy stage while Vincenzo Nibali retained the lead despite a challenge by Alberto Contador.
snippet: In the Tour de France, Blel Kadri won a rainy stage while Vincenzo Nibali retained the lead despite a challenge by Alberto Contador.
